channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fridge dumped on the corner of Cator street and commercial way, 11th December
item.description:
Hi, there is no photo of the fridge but it's been dumped on the corner of Cator street north of commercial way. Could this please be cleared away. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cator Street, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pile of rubbish dumped here, 11th December
item.description:
People are dumping here and it’s got huge! Crazy. Needs to be cleared away before pests get involved

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heavitree Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Chandler Way, 11th December
item.description:
Hi, there is a pile of flytipped rubbish on Chandler Way. There is also a whole car bumper added since I took the photo yesterday. Fly tipping on Chandler Way has reached new highs recently. Thanks for your continued help with this blight. Kind regards.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Savannah Close, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flt tipping by communal bins on Innes Street, 11th December
item.description:
Hi There, a mattress and cardboard has been fly tipped by the communal bins on Innes Street. Please could this be cleared away. This is a constant issue. Thanks for your help.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innes Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glenister Road SE100HW, 11th December
item.description:

item.title: Flooding from heavy rain on to properties, 11th December
item.description:
When heavy rain falls the water is flowing and flooding onto people properties instead of the “soak aways” that don’t work as the grass doesn’t allow to flow down. The rain just flows from the road via the driveway cross over

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lesney Park, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti sprayed on residential bicycle street box and bin containers. Located outside Bedwell house flats SW9, 11th December
item.description:
